      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">North- and south-seeking pole of an electromagnet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nord- und Süden-suchender Pfosten eines 
Elektromagneten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Poteau de nord- et de sud-seeking d'un 
électro-aimant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pólo norte e sul-procurando de um eletroímã</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Palo del nord e diricerca di un elettromagnete</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο Βορράς - και νότος-επιδιώκων τον πόλο ενός 
ηλεκτρομαγνήτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Poste del norte y sur-que busca de un 
electroimán</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that an electromagnet has a north- and south-seeking poles just like a bar magnet, as shown by the compass needle.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bar magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Coil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north-seeking pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">south-seeking pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wire</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß ein Elektromagnet 
Norden- und Süden-Suchenpfosten gerade wie ein Stabmagnet hat, wie 
durch die Kompaßnadel gezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre qu'un électro-aimant
a des poteaux d'un nord et de sud-seeking juste comme une barre 
aimantée, comme montré par l'aiguille de boussole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que um eletroímã tem
uns pólos do norte e sul-procurar apenas como um ímã de barra, como
mostrado pela agulha do compasso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che un 
elettromagnete ha i poli di sud-ricerca e di nord appena come un 
magnete della barra, come indicato dall'ago della bussola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι ένας 
ηλεκτρομαγνήτης έχει το Βορρά - και νότος-επιδιώκων τους πόλους 
ακριβώς όπως έναν μαγνήτη ράβδων, όπως εμφανίζεται από τη 
βελόνα πυξίδων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que un electroimán 
tiene postes del norte y el sur-buscar apenas como un imán de barra, 
según lo mostrado por la aguja del compás.</string>
          </description>
